title: Poweb

content: Development and maintenance of the digital marketing company's website.

title: INESC TEC
subtitle: Research assistant
content: Analysis and aplication of existing solutions to the problem of scientific data management (part of the SAIL Project, an initiative promoted by INESC TEC). My master's thesis was the result of this research.

title: Checkmarx
subtitle: Software Engineer
content: SAST Contribution to the support of the Go language for SAST, improving the detection of security flaws in cloud-native and microservices architectures. Secrets Detection & Repo Health Development of a microservices based solution for automated scanning of secret exposure (API keys, encryption keys, tokens, certificates) to prevent supply chain attacks and leaked credentials risks.
